title: mantozn
content: மழையே மழையே என்னை வருடி செல்லு என் மனதில் முதலாய் முட்கள் கீரியதே இளமாய் இதமாய் வந்து வீசும் காற்றே இதை நீ புரிந்து குளிரை ஏற்று இரவின் பயணம் கடினமானது என் நிழலும் கூட புரலி பேசுது இதைய துடிப்பின் ஓசை என் பாசை நிலை மாறுது
creator: isainthagam

title: Is there an update for https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1200198
content: I don't see a way to create an exception to only keep cookies from specific sites between closing and re-launching Firefox.
creator: bradjohnson2

title: Cannot Connect to NAS via Firefox
content: Hello Firefox - I connect to my NAS via Firefox, after a recent NAS update I've been experiencing issues with connecting to my machine. Touching on all abases before panic, is this an issue you can prescribe a visit to settings which may resolve the problem? This is the error message - Unable to connect An error occurred during a connection to 192.XXX.X.XX. The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments. If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection. If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web.
creator: walter.a.horton

title: Why will Spellchecker only correct ONE word?
content:
So I'm running British English. Spellchecker underlines all the incorrect words in red, and I can then right-click and correct ONE word. However once I have corrected the first word, all the remaining red disappears, and I can nolonger rightclick on incorrect words to correct them.

If I then click spellcheck off, and then on again, it will remark the remaining incorrect words, and I can again correct ONE word.
creator: dpoc07

title: I want to have a default download location with the ability to select an alternate location on any download
content:
I want to have a default download location with the ability to select an alternate location on any download, not to have the last download location remembered as the current save to location.

I have a primary folder to which I want to have the majority of my downloads go to, but on some occasions, I want a download to go to some other location. The current settings "Save files to" and "Always ask you where to save files" do not enable this capability.

Others have asked for this ability too.
creator: bruce.briggs

title: Blurry text after a restart
content: just did a restart and now Firefox 98.0.2 renders most text fuzzy. No other programs or windows itself are affected
creator: Jonathan73

title: guardado automático no funciona
content:
con la actualización 98 y su nueva forma de descarga automática ha hecho que ocupe mas espacio en disco pues todo se descarga aunque no lo quiera, pese a que lo he configurado a que pregunte de nuevo abrir con.

al hacer esto me sale la opción abrir con pero se descarga en la carpeta predeterminada lo que antes no sucedía...
creator: erik.astudillo

title: Can not log into my Wells Fargo account.
content:
Can not log into my Wells Fargo account. Rebooted, no change. No error. Turned off enhanced tracking. Edge works fine.

Put in Well Fargo credentials, hit go - nothing happens. Had same thing with a charity a couple days ago.
creator: jharris912

title: error code f7701-1003
content: Cannot watch anything, keep getting error code F7701-1003
creator: aubreyweatherly
